name: In the Doghouse
description:
A straightforward short visual novel about a human finding a mysterious cafe run by six dogs! They look a bit different from normal dogs....

Made in Unity with the help of the UTAGE3 engine!
https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/templates/systems/utage3-unity-text-advent...

Writing assistance and brainstorming with Speck!

Music by Iván D. Beltrán!
https://twitter.com/IvanDBeltran1
https://www.ivandbeltran.com/

Thank you for joining me for my first game jam!
